attributes.action: direct Serco to rethink the proposals for secondary education restructure in Stoke on Trent, and to discuss and research in detail the local MP's Alternative Proposals, so that the City gets local community schools, serving its local communities
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The aim of this petition is to obtain as many signatures as possible to ensure that Serco further consult with the people of Stoke on Trent regarding the secondary school re-organisation, and that Serco take on board the alternative proposals put forward by the Stoke on Trent MP's.  We want community schools!
